CatDescriptText: This image was published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, during the Christmas holiday in 1968. Standing from left: Marion 'Boonie' Hazel, Betty Wilkins Drewery, John L Drewery Jr., on right of Christmas tree, and Thelma Hazel. Seated from left: Joseph Wilkins in military uniform, with John L Drewery III on his lap, Bonita Drewery wearing plaid skirt, Joseph Drewery seated on toy tractor, and Isabel Hunter holding him. The party was in honor of Joseph Wilkins return home from the service for the holidays and was held in the Drewery apartment in the North View Heights. Thelma Hazel was the mother of Betty Wilkins Drewery and Joseph Wilkins. She married trumpet player Marion "Boonie" Hazel around 1954. John Drewery, Jr., married Betty Wilkins on May 4, 1964.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Marion "Boonie" Hazel standing on left, Joseph Wilkins wearing military uniform and holding his nephew, John Drewery III, on his lap, Betty Wilkins Drewery, Bonita Drewery wearing plaid skirt, Joseph Drewery seated on toy tractor, Isabel Hunter holding him, Thelma Hazel wearing light colored dress, and John L. Drewery, Jr., gathered around Christmas tree in Drewery apartment in North View Heights to celebrate Joseph Wilkins' homecoming from the service, another version
